item.title: Moving Away from Google
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Moved to Firefox, and looking for other service providers so I can move away from Google.
item.content:encoded: Moved to Firefox, and looking for other service providers so I can move away from Google.

item.title: Firefox 3.5
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Finally it came out, and surely the key feature is private mode >:), though this has been there in IE8 and Safari 4 for quite some time (weeks?). I have too many browsers installed on my company-issued laptop, pity I cannot upgrade to IE8 as it is explicitly banned by IT gurus, actually I like [...]
item.content:encoded:
Finally it came out, and surely the key feature is private mode >:), though this has been there in IE8 and Safari 4 for quite some time (weeks?).

I have too many browsers installed on my company-issued laptop, pity I cannot upgrade to IE8 as it is explicitly banned by IT gurus, actually I like Firefox and IE more than anything else (Opera and Safari), especially Safari, consumed too much resource.
